biography: Simo, a member of Hirsala Golf, is one of the most decorated players in recent Hector Trophée history.  His aggressive style and fiery demeanor on the course have become his trademarks. He is known for his powerful drives and clutch putting, which have propelled him to victory on multiple occasions.

Simo's Hector Trophée record is nothing short of remarkable. He's made the tournament every year since 2022, winning three times – in 2021, and twice in the Hector Trophée's storied history. While his record in the team competition is incredible, he has yet to claim the individual Victor trophy.  This may be the year that changes.

While known for his exceptional golfing talent, Simo is also known for his colorful language and intense focus. He's not afraid to show emotion on the course, which adds to the drama and excitement of his matches. It's a testament to his competitiveness and his will to win. Expect fireworks – and perhaps a few choice words – from Simo during the tournament.
